title: Mesenchymal chondrosarcoma—observations on 30 new cases
publication_info: AH Salvador, JW Beabout, DC Dahlin - Cancer, 1971 - Wiley Online Library
snippet:
Thirty new cases of mesenchymal chondrosarcoma are presented, bringing the total of well‐documented 
cases in the literature to only 51. Seventeen of these arose in soft tissues. The ribs and jaws 
were the most common sites of origin; only five tumors arose in major tubular …
